||~ STATUS ||
|| [[span style="font-weight: normal; font-family: Stencil; font-size: 140%; color: green; padding: 3pt 3pt;"]]APPROVED[[/span]] ||
= //The motion passes. SCP-7101 is to be terminated on 25/July/2042, after reaching total completion of its Special Containment Procedures, via the usage of [[[SCP-6659|SCP-6659]]].//
------

[[div style="border:solid 1px #999999; background:#ccc8c8; padding:5px; margin-bottom: 10px;"]]
[[=]]
+##black|SCP-7101 Termination Log##
[[div style="background: url("https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/the-great-hippo/scp_trans.png") center no-repeat; float: center; border: solid 2px #000; padding: 1px 15px; box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2);"]]

||~ **ACTIVATION NUMBER: 7101** ||
|| **##orange|TOTEMIZED OBJECT:##** A 4-leafed clover coated in SCP-7101-1.  ||
|| **##orange|WORSHIP GROUP:##** The Human Noosphere. ||
|| **##orange|REULTS:##** Succesful identification and acceleration of memetic construct.||
|| **##orange|NOTES:##** Efforts are being made to eliminate any possible instance of SCP-7101 evocation. Additionally, the human Noosphere is being scanned for possible resurgences of SCP-7101-A, as well as possible conceptual links that could personify, and, by extension, deify memetic constructs housing positive or negative "Luck". Upon the conclusion of this document, all synonymous words pertaining to "Luck", "Fortune", or "Fate" are to be purged from all literature, media, and the human population's general usage.   ||

[[/=]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:anomaly-class-bar-source

|item-number= 7101

|clearance= 5

|container-class= neutralized

|secondary-class= none

|secondary-icon= none

|disruption-class= dark

|risk-class= notice

]]

----
**Special Containment Procedures:** Due to being contained within SCP-6659-C, SCP-7101 is to be considered neutralized.

**Description:** SCP-7101 was an omnipresent, theoretically omnipotent deific entity that attempted to conform to the human Noosphere's conception of "████" or " ███████" which is [DATA EXPUNGED].

SCP-7101 was observed to display itself in increasingly noticeable and concerning manners, which directly threatened the state of the Veil and the safety of humanity, forcing the Foundation into preemptive termination.

The SCP-7101 slot is to be redistributed to a more appropriate designation on 29, August 2042.
